digitalArt.title: Digital Art Tips
tips: Use layers effectively — separate your line art, coloring, and lighting for better control and easy editing.
Experiment with custom brushes to add unique textures and personal style to your work.
Zoom out often to check overall composition and balance — details can distract from the big picture.

painting.title: Painting Tips
tips: Start with a rough sketch or underpainting to plan values and shapes before adding color.
Use larger brushes in early stages to block in main forms and switch to smaller ones for details.
Balance warm and cool tones to create depth and mood in your artwork.

colorTheory.title: Color Theory Tips
tips: Use complementary colors to make your artwork pop — they create strong visual contrast.
Limit your color palette to maintain harmony and focus within a composition.
Understand color temperature — warm colors advance while cool colors recede.

artPresentation.title: Art Sharing Tips
tips: Use consistent lighting when photographing or scanning your artwork to ensure accurate colors.
Write short but engaging captions to give viewers insight into your creative process.
Keep your online portfolio organized by style to make browsing enjoyable for visitors.
